txt.en:
Bounty: Bel Inzûl Proto-salamander

There is no safety while the proto-salamander basks near the rock outcroppings of the easternmost part of Bel Inzûl.

Slaughter the menace and return to Bel Inzûl's healer for reward.

Do not go alone.
Speak with the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl
You defeated the menace in the western skies. Return to the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl to claim your reward.
You accepted a bounty for defeating the proto-salamander that basks near the rocks on eastern Bel Inzûl.
'The rocks are safe? You want the reward, yes?\n\n'Thank you, friend. Killing the creature makes our efforts on the island much safer.'
You defeated the Bel Inzûl proto-salamander
Gather a fellowship and make your way to the eastern side of Bel Inzûl. Defeat the Bel Inzûl proto-salamander.
